works.title: You can't go home again
works.summary: The home you remember no longer exists. It's a hard truth, but one you must eventually face.

works.title: You can't take it with you
works.summary: We must leave something deep behind. There ain't no ash will burn.

works.title: You can go home again
works.summary: The home you remember is exactly how you left it. It's a hard truth, but one you already know.

works.title: You can take it with you
works.summary: We must leave nothing deep behind. Ash trees will burn.
